file_content.text: Treek has expressed great satisfaction with you as an employer. I hope you feel the same about her.
Greetings! My client has never had the pleasure of meeting a member of the Jedi Order. Such excitement!
Salutations! My client will be excited to greet you. We have profound respect for the Republic Armed Forces.
Welcome, Captain! Your reputation precedes you. My client will be thrilled to meet you in person.
Welcome! Your recent accomplishments have earned my client's greatest respect. We are so very excited to meet you.

I am RA-30 of Interstellar Commandos, Incorporated. I represent an especially gifted individual in the tactical security trade. Do you seek a mercenary to provide assistance with battlefield operations?
The enemies I face aren't your typical armed forces. I doubt your employer is trained to fight Sith.
My work isn't for mercenaries.
I can assure you this person has never been the least bit intimidated by any combatant.
I fear a mercenary might grow restless working for me. Most of my journeys are spent in pursuit of knowledge and understanding.
I seek wisdom before violence.
You are too modest! The objectives you seek are frequently surrounded by horrible dangers. My employer appreciates that.
The soldiers under my command are the best of the best--and they wear a Havoc Squad uniform.
My people serve the military.
Of course! However, Provision 878-BCM of the Military Defense Act permits Republic commanders to subcontract licensed combat specialists such as my employer.
I think you've got me confused with someone else. I conduct legitimate business. Also, I'm allergic to blasters.
I'm just an honest captain.
Your gifts for understatement and misdirection are well-known, Captain. Rest assured, my employer maintains the greatest discretion.
I don't need a sales pitch. Just introduce me to this mercenary.
Where is your client?
Rest assured, my employer is en route. In the meantime, I am instructed to provide a proper introduction.
If by "assistance," you mean "someone to draw enemy fire away from me," then yes--I'm always hiring.
Cannon fodder is useful.
I am confident my employer can survive anything you require.
I warn you in advance, there are some who find this mercenary's physical appearance unusual. However, great warriors come in all shapes and sizes.
My client has fought on Taris, Nar Shaddaa and Balmorra. Most recently, she defended the Corellian Engineering Corporation's primary shipyard.
I was on Corellia. The fighting was intense. This mercenary must be good to have survived.
That's impressive.
Not merely survived--successfully fought off a platoon of determined Imperial soldiers. The CEC compensated her well for that service.
My client has fought on Taris, Nar Shaddaa and Ord Mantell. Most recently, she guarded commercial freighter convoys against pirate boarding parties.
This mercenary must be good. Close-quarters fighting aboard starships isn't easy. One stray shot can decompress an entire vessel.
That's impressive.
A fact my employer took advantage of with great success. Many pirates found themselves in hard vacuum that day. The convoy owner was pleased.
This mercenary doesn't have any shortage of employers. I'm sure corporations pay more than I can.
I can't afford to pay much.
Simply put, corporate work can be rather dull. You, on the other hand, are involved in exciting endeavors.
Sounds like this mercenary doesn't lack for a guaranteed salary. My crew works for a commission.
I only offer irregular pay.
My employer is prepared to accept your terms. She is willing to trade a certain amount of security for excitement.
You're obviously programmed to make this mercenary sound impressive. It's not working.
Spare me the bragging.
How unfortunate. I will have to install an upgraded sales negotiation module.
Ah, here she is now! Allow me to introduce Treek. She has journeyed all the way from an exotic Outer Rim system in search of adventure and purpose.
Great Jedi warrior, vanquisher of Sith many and wielder of mighty hummacutter... I salute your legendary victories endless!
You're very kind, but I didn't achieve those victories alone. One of my strongest allies is a droid about the same size as you.
Nice to meet a new friend.
Size provides advantages many on the battlefield. The big enemy always underestimates me and regrets it!
I hear rumors of a brave Jedi, vanquishing foes many and wielding a mighty hummacutter. I welcome your promise of victories endless!
I'm not sure where you heard all that, but thank you for the vote of confidence. You're the most enthusiastic mercenary I've ever met.
Thanks. It's nice meeting you.
I admire a strong warrior of bold cause and great potential. You are one worth serving.
Brave Jedi explorer, seeker of mysteries many, wielder of mighty hummacutter... I stand ready to defend you from enemies endless!
You honor me, Treek. From what this droid says, you're something of an explorer and seeker as well. Perhaps we're meant to journey together.
I'm pleased to meet you.
I was a great pathfinder on my homeworld. I wandered far, conquered challenges many. I seek a new horizon with you, bold Jedi.
You are the bold new Jedi explorer, the challenger of mysteries many. You stand with hummacutter held ready. I will stand with you against foes endless!
Hello, there. Considering we've only just met, you're quite committed to forming a partnership.
That's a generous greeting.
I see potentials many in you. I seek a legendary journey with an ally worthy of my skill.
That word you used... were you referring to my lightsaber?
What is a "hummacutter"?
Yes! Hummacutter sounds better. Powerful weapon of a mighty noise. I respect your skill with it.
Great leader of the mighty Havoc Squad, veteran of battlefields many and destroyer of Imperials endless... I salute your valor!
You don't report to me just yet. No need to start polishing my boots.
At ease.
I charge extra to polish things. It is not my specialty. I am a warrior and seeker of great challenges.
Brave Republic soldier, veteran of Ord Mantell's battlefields many and destroyer of separatists endless like me... I salute your potential for greatness.
I figured I met everyone worth knowing on Ord Mantell. How'd I miss you?
I'm surprised we've never met.
I fought for the government and ran night raids on separatist camps. I was always quiet and unseen. Good policy.
You are the mighty outlaw captain, plunderer of riches many and conqueror of enemies endless. You honor me, Voidwolf vanquisher!
I don't care what other people say--you're alright in my book. Please, continue with your praise.
I like you already.
This meeting was fated. You are the one I seek to serve.
You have earned a reputation I respect, Captain. Sources many say you are a mercenary with potential endless.
I'm glad to hear people say good things about me. Wish I could say I've heard of you.
Nice to meet you, short stuff.
My reputation is excellent. Employers many have great satisfaction with my service.
No offense, but you don't seem cut out for my line of work. Do you even know how to shoot a blaster?
I'm not sure about this.
I defeat foes many, and blasters do not save them. There are advantages endless in being a small angry target. Do not doubt me.
I can barely translate what's coming out of your mouth. Who taught you how to communicate?
You sound ridiculous.
I speak well. Besides, no need for talking when fighting.
You are a great Republic hero! We have both defeated foes many. Together, we will conquer challenges endless!
Hello there.
I seek to join one destined for greatness, like me. You are that person.
Is this a practical joke?
You doubt my skills? Do not. I have achieved greatness.
Let me guess: You're nuts.
My mind is sharper than any blade. It is my greatest weapon.
I offer simple terms. I provide clear eyes and strong arms. I fight for you. Together we will have even greater victories! You agree?
Treek, I look forward to having you at my side. You'll be fairly compensated for whatever trouble comes our way.
I'm happy to have you aboard.
Let us seek danger. We go!
We haven't discussed your price yet, but I get the idea you're flexible on the amount. Welcome to my team.
We'll work out your fee.
Do not worry, my payment takes care of itself. Enemies offer the promise of good looting.
All I've heard so far is a lot of bluster and crazy talk. Show me you can hold your own, and I'll think about paying you.
Offer me a free trial.
You will see. Enemies many will fall, cut down by my skills.
You are now my chief. Call, and I will fight for you.
You are now my chief. I will take my gear to your starship and wait for your orders.
I am ever so pleased you found my client satisfactory. I wish you both good fortune in your future endeavors. Good day.
I am RA-30 with Interstellar Commandos, Incorporated. Have a safe day!
